105300 LINKAGE SECTION.                                                 06380000
105400***************************************************************   06390000
105500*                 * * * * * * * * *                           *   06400000
105600*    REVIEW CODES ARE USED TO DIRECT THE PPCAL  SUBROUTINE    *   06410000
105700*    IN HOW TO PAY THE BILL.                                  *   06420000
105800*                         *****                               *   06430000
105900*    COMMENTS  ** CLAIMS RECEIVED WITH CONDITION CODE 66      *   06440000
106000*                 SHOULD BE PROCESSED UNDER REVIEW CODE 06,   *   06450000
106100*                 07 OR 11 AS APPROPRIATE TO EXCLUDE ANY      *   06460000
106200*                 OUTLIER COMPUTATION.                        *   06470000
106300*                         *****                               *   06480000
106400*         REVIEW-CODE:                                        *   06490000
106500*            00 = PAY-WITH-OUTLIER.                           *   06500000
106600*                 WILL CALCULATE THE STANDARD PAYMENT.        *   06510000
106700*                 WILL ALSO ATTEMPT TO PAY ONLY COST          *   06520000
106800*                 OUTLIERS, DAY OUTLIERS EXPIRED 10/01/97     *   06530000
106900*            03 = PAY-PERDIEM-DAYS.                           *   06540000
107000*                 WILL CALCULATE A PERDIEM PAYMENT BASED ON   *   06550000
107100*                 THE STANDARD PAYMENT IF THE COVERED DAYS    *   06560000
107200*                 ARE LESS THAN THE AVERAGE LENGTH OF STAY    *   06570000
107300*                 FOR THE DRG. IF COVERED DAYS EQUAL OR       *   06580000
107400*                 EXCEED THE AVERAGE LENGTH OF STAY, THE      *   06590000
107500*                 STANDARD PAYMENT IS CALCULATED. WILL ALSO   *   06600000
107600*                 CALCULATE THE COST OUTLIER PORTION OF THE   *   06610000
107700*                 PAYMENT IF THE ADJUSTED CHARGES ON THE      *   06620000
107800*                 BILL EXCEED THE COST THRESHOLD.             *   06630000
107900*            06 = PAY-XFER-NO-COST                            *   06640000
108000*                 WILL CALCULATE A PERDIEM PAYMENT BASED ON   *   06650000
108100*                 THE STANDARD PAYMENT IF THE COVERED DAYS    *   06660000
108200*                 ARE LESS THAN THE AVERAGE LENGTH OF STAY    *   06670000
108300*                 FOR THE DRG.  IF COVERED DAYS EQUAL OR      *   06680000
108400*                 EXCEED THE AVERAGE LENGTH OF STAY, THE      *   06690000
108500*                 STANDARD PAYMENT IS CALCULATED. WILL NOT    *   06700000
108600*                 CALCULATE ANY COST OUTLIER PORTION          *   06710000
108700*                 OF THE PAYMENT.                             *   06720000
108800*            07 = PAY-WITHOUT-COST.                           *   06730000
108900*                 WILL CALCULATE THE STANDARD PAYMENT         *   06740000
109000*                 WITHOUT COST PORTION.                       *   06750000
109100*            09 = PAY-XFER-SPEC-DRG - POST-ACUTE TRANSFERS    *   06760000
109200*                 50-50> 28  29  30  40  41  42  219              06770000
109300*                        220 221 477 478 479 480 481              06780000
109400*                        482 492 493 494 500 501 502              06790000
109500*                        515 516 517                              06800000
109600* =======================================================         06801000
109700* THE 50/50 DRG'S DO NOT REPEAT WITH THE FULL PERDIEM DRG'S       06801000
109800* =======================================================         06801000

110000*                                                                 06801000
110100*     FULL PERDIEM >   3   4   25  26  27  28          31         06802000

133000                                                                  08050000
133100***************************************************************   08060000
133200*    THIS DATA IS CALCULATED BY THIS PPCAL  SUBROUTINE        *   08070000
133300*    AND PASSED BACK TO THE CALLING PROGRAM                   *   08080000
133400*            RETURN CODE VALUES (PPS-RTC)                     *   08090000
133500*                                                             *   08100000
133600*            PPS-RTC 00-49 = HOW THE BILL WAS PAID            *   08110000
133700*                                                             *   08120000
133800*      PPS-RTC 30,33,40,42,44  = OUTLIER RECONCILIATION       *   08130000
133900*                                                             *   08140000
134000*           30,00 = PAID NORMAL DRG PAYMENT                   *   08150000
134100*                                                             *   08160000
134200*              01 = PAID AS A DAY-OUTLIER.                    *   08170000
134300*                   NOTE:                                     *   08180000
134400*                     DAY-OUTLIER NO LONGER BEING PAID        *   08190000
134500*                         AS OF 10/01/97                      *   08200000
134600*                                                             *   08210000
134700*              02 = PAID AS A COST-OUTLIER.                   *   08220000
134800*                                                             *   08230000
134900*           33,03 = TRANSFER PAID ON A PERDIEM BASIS UP TO    *   08240000
135000*                   AND INCLUDING THE FULL DRG.               *   08250000
135100*              05 = TRANSFER PAID ON A PERDIEM BASIS UP TO    *   08260000
135200*                   AND INCLUDING THE FULL DRG WHICH ALSO     *   08270000
135300*                   QUALIFIED FOR A COST OUTLIER PAYMENT.     *   08280000
135400*              06 = TRANSFER PAID ON A PERDIEM BASIS UP TO    *   08290000
135500*                   AND INCLUDING THE FULL DRG. PROVIDER      *   08300000
135600*                   REFUSED COST OUTLIER.                     *   08310000
135700*           40,10 = POST-ACUTE TRANSFER                       *   08320000
135800*                   DRG = 28  29  30  40  41  42  219             08330000
135900*                         220 221 477 478 479 480 481             08340000
136000*                         482 492 493 494 500 501 502             08350000
136100*                         515 516 517                             08360000
136200*                                                                 08370000
136300* =======================================================         06801000
136400* THE 50/50 DRG'S DO NOT REPEAT WITH THE POSTACUTE  DRG'S         06801000
136500* =======================================================         06801000
136600*                                                                 06860000
136700*           42,12 = POST-ACAUTE TRANSFER WITH SPECIFIC DRGS   *   08380000
136800*                       THE FOLLOWING DRG'S                   *   08390000
136900*                   DRG = 3   4   25  26  27              31      08400000
137000*                         32  33              54  55  56  57      08410000
137100*                         64  65  66  70  71  72  85  86  87      08420000
137200*                         91  92  93  100 101 163 164 165 166     08430000
137300*                         167 168 175 176 177 178 179 186 187     08440000
137400*                         188 190 191 192 193 194 195 196 197     08450000
137500*                         198 205 206 207 216 217 218             08460000
137600*                             228 229 230 233 234 235 236 239     08470000
137700*                         240 241 242 243 244 255 256 257 264     08480000
137800*                         280 281 282 288 289 290 291 292 293     08490000
137900*                         299 300 301 314 315 316 326 327 328     08500000
138000*                         329 330 331 332 333 334 335 336 337     08510000
138100*                         356 357 358 371 372 373 374 375 376     08520000
138200*                         377 378 379 380 381 382 388 389 390     08530000
138300*                         405 406 407 414 415 416 441 442 443     08540000
138400*                         459 460 463 464 465 466 467 468 469     08550000
138500*                         470 474 475 476                         08560000
138600*                             483 484 488 489             495     08570000
138700*                         496 497             510 511 512         08580000
138800*                                 533 534 535 536 539 540 541     08590000
138900*                         542 543 544 545 546 547 551 552 557     08600000
139000*                         558 559 560 561 562 563 573 574 575     08610000
139100*                         579 580 581 592 593 594 602 603 616     08620000
139200*                         617 618 622 623 624 628 629 630 637     08630000
139300*                         638 639 640 641 643 644 645 653 654     08640000
139400*                         655 659 660 661 682 683 684 689 690     08650000
139500*                         698 699 700 840 841 842 853 854 855     08660000
139600*                         856 857 858 862 863 867 868 869 870     08670000
139700*                         871 872 884 896 897 907 908 909 917     08680000
139800*                         918 945 946 947 948 956 981 982 983     08690000
139900*                         987 988 989                             08700000
140000*                                                                 08710000
140100*           44,14 = PAID NORMAL DRG PAYMENT WITH              *   08720000
140200*                    PERDIEM DAYS = OR > GM  ALOS             *   08730000
140300*              16 = PAID AS A COST-OUTLIER WITH               *   08740000
140400*                    PERDIEM DAYS = OR > GM  ALOS             *   08750000
140500*                                                             *   08760000
140600*            PPS-RTC 50-99 = WHY THE BILL WAS NOT PAID        *   08770000
140700*              51 = NO PROVIDER SPECIFIC INFO FOUND           *   08780000
140800*              52 = INVALID CBSA# IN PROVIDER FILE            *   08790000
140900*                   OR INVALID WAGE INDEX                     *   08800000
141000*              53 = WAIVER STATE - NOT CALCULATED BY PPS      *   08810000
141100*              54 = INVALID DRG                               *   08820000
141200*              55 = DISCHARGE DATE < PROVIDER EFF START DATE  *   08830000
141300*                                      OR                     *   08840000
141400*                   DISCHARGE DATE < CBSA EFF START DATE      *   08850000
141500*                   FOR PPS                                   *   08860000
141600*                                      OR                     *   08870000
141700*                   PROVIDER HAS BEEN TERMINATED ON OR BEFORE *   08880000
141800*                   DISCHARGE DATE                            *   08890000
141900*              56 = INVALID LENGTH OF STAY                    *   08900000
142000*              57 = REVIEW CODE INVALID (NOT 00 03 06 07 09   *   08910000
142100*                                        NOT 11)              *   08920000
142200*              58 = TOTAL CHARGES NOT NUMERIC                 *   08930000
142300*              61 = LIFETIME RESERVE DAYS NOT NUMERIC         *   08940000
142400*                   OR BILL-LTR-DAYS > 60                     *   08950000
142500*              62 = INVALID NUMBER OF COVERED DAYS            *   08960000
142600*              65 = PAY-CODE NOT = A,B OR C ON PROVIDER       *   08970000
142700*                   SPECIFIC FILE FOR CAPITAL                 *   08980000
142800*              67 = COST OUTLIER WITH LOS > COVERED DAYS      *   08990000
142900*                   OR COST OUTLIER THRESHOLD CALUCULATION    *   09000000
143000*              98 = CANNOT PROCESS BILL OLDER THAN 5 YEARS    *   09010000
143100***************************************************************   09020000
143200 01  PPS-DATA.                                                    09030000
143300         10  PPS-RTC                PIC 9(02).                    09040000
143400         10  PPS-WAGE-INDX          PIC 9(02)V9(04).              09050000
143500         10  PPS-OUTLIER-DAYS       PIC 9(03).                    09060000
143600         10  PPS-AVG-LOS            PIC 9(02)V9(01).              09070000
143700         10  PPS-DAYS-CUTOFF        PIC 9(02)V9(01).              09080000
143800         10  PPS-OPER-IME-ADJ       PIC 9(06)V9(02).              09090000
143900         10  PPS-TOTAL-PAYMENT      PIC 9(07)V9(02).              09100000

144100         10  PPS-OPER-FSP-PART      PIC 9(06)V9(02).              09120000
144200         10  PPS-OPER-OUTLIER-PART  PIC 9(07)V9(02).              09130000
144300         10  PPS-REG-DAYS-USED      PIC 9(03).                    09140000

145000*           PROGRAMS THAT WILL BE PASSED BACK----                 09210000
145100*          ASSOCIATED WITH THE BILL BEING PROCESSED               09220000
145200******************************************************************09230000

164700             15  P-NEW-CAPI-PPS-PAY-CODE   PIC X.                 11000000
164800             15  P-NEW-CAPI-HOSP-SPEC-RATE PIC 9(04)V99.          11010000

165300             15  P-NEW-CAPI-IME            PIC 9V9999.            11060000
165400             15  P-NEW-CAPI-EXCEPTIONS     PIC 9(04)V99.          11070000
165500         05  P-HVBP-HRR-DATA.                                     08690000
165600             15  P-VAL-BASED-PURCH-PARTIPNT PIC X.                08690100
165700             15  P-VAL-BASED-PURCH-ADJUST   PIC 9V9(11).          08690200
165800             15  P-HOSP-READMISSION-REDUCTN PIC X.                08690300
165900             15  P-HOSP-HRR-ADJUSTMT        PIC 9V9(4).           08690400
166000         05  P-MODEL1-BUNDLE-DATA.                                      08
166100             15  P-MODEL1-BUNDLE-DISPRCNT   PIC V999.                   08
166200             15  P-HAC-REDUC-IND            PIC X.
166300             15  P-UNCOMP-CARE-AMOUNT       PIC 9(07)V99.
166400             15  P-EHR-REDUC-IND            PIC X.
166500         05  FILLER                         PIC X(09).
166600
166700******************************************************************11090000
166800 01  WAGE-NEW-CBSA-INDEX-RECORD.                                  11100000
166900     05  W-CBSA                        PIC X(5).                  11110000
167000     05  W-CBSA-SIZE                   PIC X.                     11120000
167100         88  LARGE-URBAN       VALUE 'L'.                         11130000
167200         88  OTHER-URBAN       VALUE 'O'.                         11140000
167300         88  ALL-RURAL         VALUE 'R'.                         11150000
167400     05  W-CBSA-EFF-DATE               PIC X(8).                  11160000
167500     05  FILLER                        PIC X.                     11170000
167600     05  W-CBSA-INDEX-RECORD           PIC S9(02)V9(04).          11180000
167700     05  W-CBSA-PR-INDEX-RECORD        PIC S9(02)V9(04).          11190000
167800                                                                  11200000
167900                                                                  11210000
168000 PROCEDURE DIVISION  USING BILL-NEW-DATA                          11220000
168100                           PPS-DATA                               11230000
168200                           PRICER-OPT-VERS-SW                     11240000
168300                           PPS-ADDITIONAL-VARIABLES               11250000
168400                           PROV-NEW-HOLD                          11260000
168500                           WAGE-NEW-CBSA-INDEX-RECORD.            11270000
168600                                                                  11280000
168700***************************************************************   11290000
168800*    PROCESSING:                                              *   11300000
168900*        A. WILL PROCESS CASES BASED ON DISCHARGE DATE            11310000
169000*        B. INITIALIZE PPCAL  HOLD VARIABLES.                 *   11320000
169100*        C. EDIT THE DATA PASSED FROM THE BILL BEFORE         *   11330000
169200*           ATTEMPTING TO CALCULATE PPS. IF THIS BILL         *   11340000
169300*           CANNOT BE PROCESSED, SET A RETURN CODE AND        *   11350000
169400*           GOBACK.                                           *   11360000
169500*        D. ASSEMBLE PRICING COMPONENTS.                      *   11370000
169600*        E. CALCULATE THE PRICE.                              *   11380000
169700***************************************************************   11390000
169800                                                                  11400000
169900     MOVE ZEROES TO NON-TEMP-RELIEF-PAYMENT.                      11410000
170000     MOVE 'N' TO TEMP-RELIEF-FLAG.                                11420000
170100     MOVE 'N' TO OUTLIER-RECON-FLAG.                              11430000
170200                                                                  11440000
170300     PERFORM 0200-MAINLINE-CONTROL THRU 0200-EXIT.                11450000
170400                                                                  11460000
170500     MOVE HOLD-ADDITIONAL-VARIABLES TO  PPS-ADDITIONAL-VARIABLES. 11470000
170600     MOVE H-DSCHG-FRCTN             TO  PPS-DSCHG-FRCTN.          11480000
170700     MOVE H-DRG-WT-FRCTN            TO  PPS-DRG-WT-FRCTN.         11490000
170800     MOVE HOLD-CAPITAL-VARIABLES    TO  PPS-CAPITAL-VARIABLES.    11500000
170900     MOVE HOLD-CAPITAL2-VARIABLES   TO  PPS-CAPITAL2-VARIABLES.   11510000
171000     MOVE CAL-VERSION               TO  PPS-CALC-VERS.            11520000
171100     MOVE HOLD-OTHER-VARIABLES      TO  PPS-OTHER-VARIABLES.      11530000
171200     MOVE HOLD-PC-OTH-VARIABLES     TO  PPS-PC-OTH-VARIABLES.     11540000
171300                                                                  11550000
171400     IF (PPS-RTC = '00' OR '03' OR '10' OR                        11560000
171500                   '12' OR '14')                                  11570000
171600        MOVE 'Y' TO OUTLIER-RECON-FLAG                            11580000
171700        MOVE PPS-DATA TO HLD-PPS-DATA                             11590000
171800        PERFORM 0200-MAINLINE-CONTROL THRU 0200-EXIT              11600000
171900        MOVE HLD-PPS-DATA TO PPS-DATA.                            11610000
172000                                                                  11620000
172100     GOBACK.                                                      11630000
172200                                                                  11640000
172300 0200-MAINLINE-CONTROL.                                           11650000
172400                                                                  11660000
172500     MOVE 'N' TO HMO-TAG.                                         11670000
172600                                                                  11680000
172700     IF PPS-PC-HMO-FLAG = 'Y' OR                                  11690000
172800               HMO-FLAG = 'Y'                                     11700000
172900        MOVE 'Y' TO HMO-TAG.                                      11710000
173000                                                                  11720000
173100     IF P-NEW-STATE NOT = 40                                      11730000
173200        MOVE ZEROES TO W-CBSA-PR-INDEX-RECORD.                    11740000
173300                                                                  11750000
173400     MOVE ALL '0' TO PPS-DATA                                     11760000
173500                     H-OPER-DSH-SCH                               11770000
173600                     H-OPER-DSH-RRC                               11780000
173700                     HOLD-PPS-COMPONENTS                          11790000
173800                     HOLD-PPS-COMPONENTS                          11800000
173900                     HOLD-ADDITIONAL-VARIABLES                    11810000
174000                     HOLD-CAPITAL-VARIABLES                       11820000
174100                     HOLD-CAPITAL2-VARIABLES                      11830000
174200                     HOLD-OTHER-VARIABLES                         11840000
174300                     HOLD-PC-OTH-VARIABLES.                       11850000
174400                                                                  11860000
174500     IF P-NEW-CAPI-HOSP-SPEC-RATE NOT NUMERIC                     11870000
174600        MOVE 0 TO P-NEW-CAPI-HOSP-SPEC-RATE.                      11880000
174700                                                                  11890000
174800     IF P-NEW-CAPI-OLD-HARM-RATE  NOT NUMERIC                     11900000
174900        MOVE 0 TO P-NEW-CAPI-OLD-HARM-RATE.                       11910000
175000                                                                  11920000
175100     IF P-NEW-CAPI-NEW-HARM-RATIO NOT NUMERIC                     11930000
175200        MOVE 0 TO P-NEW-CAPI-NEW-HARM-RATIO.                      11940000
175300                                                                  11950000
175400     IF P-NEW-CAPI-CSTCHG-RATIO NOT NUMERIC                       11960000
175500        MOVE 0 TO P-NEW-CAPI-CSTCHG-RATIO.                        11970000
175600                                                                  11980000
175700                                                                  11990000
175800     PERFORM 1000-EDIT-THE-BILL-INFO.                             12000000
175900                                                                  12010000
176000     IF  PPS-RTC = 00                                             12020000
176100         PERFORM 2000-ASSEMBLE-PPS-VARIABLES                      12030000
176200         PERFORM 3000-CALC-PAYMENT THRU 3000-EXIT.                12040000
176300                                                                  12050000
176400     IF OUTLIER-RECON-FLAG = 'Y'                                  12060000
176500        MOVE 'N' TO OUTLIER-RECON-FLAG                            12070000
176600        GO TO 0200-EXIT.                                          12080000
176700                                                                  12090000
176800     IF PPS-RTC = 00                                              12100000
176900        IF H-PERDIEM-DAYS = H-ALOS OR                             12110000
177000           H-PERDIEM-DAYS > H-ALOS                                12120000
177100           MOVE 14 TO PPS-RTC.                                    12130000
177200                                                                  12140000
177300     IF PPS-RTC = 02                                              12150000
177400        IF H-PERDIEM-DAYS = H-ALOS OR                             12160000
177500           H-PERDIEM-DAYS > H-ALOS                                12170000
177600           MOVE 16 TO PPS-RTC.                                    12180000
177700                                                                  12190000

177900                                                                  12210000

178100                                                                  12230000

178400                                                                  12260000

185500             MOVE 54 TO PPS-RTC.                                  12970000
185600                                                                  12980000
185700     IF  PPS-RTC = 00                                             12990000
185800            IF  ((B-DISCHARGE-DATE < P-NEW-EFF-DATE) OR           13000000
185900                 (B-DISCHARGE-DATE < W-CBSA-EFF-DATE))            13010000
186000                MOVE 55 TO PPS-RTC.                               13020000
186100                                                                  13030000
186200     IF  PPS-RTC = 00                                             13040000
186300         IF P-NEW-TERMINATION-DATE > 00000000                     13050000

186500                 (B-DISCHARGE-DATE > P-NEW-TERMINATION-DATE))     13070000

186700                                                                  13090000
186800     IF  PPS-RTC = 00                                             13100000
186900         IF  B-LOS NOT NUMERIC                                    13110000
187000             MOVE 56 TO PPS-RTC                                   13120000
187100         ELSE                                                     13130000
187200         IF  B-LOS = 0                                            13140000
187300             IF B-REVIEW-CODE NOT = 00 AND                        13150000
187400                              NOT = 03 AND                        13160000
187500                              NOT = 06 AND                        13170000
187600                              NOT = 07 AND                        13180000
187700                              NOT = 09 AND                        13190000
187800                              NOT = 11                            13200000
187900             MOVE 56 TO PPS-RTC.                                  13210000
188000                                                                  13220000
188100     IF  PPS-RTC = 00                                             13230000
188200         IF  B-LTR-DAYS NOT NUMERIC OR B-LTR-DAYS > 60            13240000
188300             MOVE 61 TO PPS-RTC                                   13250000
188400         ELSE                                                     13260000
188500             MOVE B-LTR-DAYS TO H-LTR-DAYS.                       13270000
188600                                                                  13280000
188700     IF  PPS-RTC = 00                                             13290000
188800         IF  B-COVERED-DAYS NOT NUMERIC                           13300000
188900             MOVE 62 TO PPS-RTC                                   13310000
189000         ELSE                                                     13320000
189100         IF  B-COVERED-DAYS = 0 AND B-LOS > 0                     13330000
189200             MOVE 62 TO PPS-RTC                                   13340000
189300         ELSE                                                     13350000
189400             MOVE B-COVERED-DAYS TO H-COV-DAYS.                   13360000
189500                                                                  13370000
189600     IF  PPS-RTC = 00                                             13380000
189700         IF  H-LTR-DAYS  > H-COV-DAYS                             13390000
189800             MOVE 62 TO PPS-RTC                                   13400000
189900         ELSE                                                     13410000
190000             COMPUTE H-REG-DAYS = H-COV-DAYS - H-LTR-DAYS.        13420000
190100                                                                  13430000
190200     IF  PPS-RTC = 00                                             13440000
190300         IF  NOT VALID-REVIEW-CODE                                13450000
190400             MOVE 57 TO PPS-RTC.                                  13460000
190500                                                                  13470000
190600     IF  PPS-RTC = 00                                             13480000
190700         IF  B-CHARGES-CLAIMED NOT NUMERIC                        13490000
190800             MOVE 58 TO PPS-RTC.                                  13500000
190900                                                                  13510000
191000     IF PPS-RTC = 00                                              13520000
191100           IF P-NEW-CAPI-NEW-HOSP NOT = 'Y'                       13530000

191300                                            NOT = 'B' AND         13550000
191400                                            NOT = 'C'             13560000

191600                                                                  13580000

210200         MOVE DRG-WT (DX5 DX6)         TO H-DRG-WT                15290000

210700 3000-CALC-PAYMENT.                                               15340000
210800***************************************************************   15350000
210900                                                                  15360000
211000     PERFORM 3100-CALC-STAY-UTILIZATION.                          15370000

211200     PERFORM 3900A-CALC-OPER-DSH THRU 3900A-EXIT.                 15390000
211300                                                                  15400000
211400***********************************************************       15410000
211500***  OPERATING IME CALCULATION                                    15420000
211600***  OPERATING IME CALCULATION                                    15430000
211700                                                                  15440000
211800     COMPUTE H-OPER-IME-TEACH ROUNDED =                           15450000
211900            1.35 * ((1 + H-INTERN-RATIO) ** .405  - 1).           15460000
212000                                                                  15470000
212100***********************************************************       15480000
212200                                                                  15490000
212300     IF P-N-SCH-REBASED-FY90 OR                                   15500000
212400        P-N-EACH OR                                               15510000
212500        P-N-MDH-REBASED-FY90                                      15520000
212600         PERFORM 3450-CALC-ADDITIONAL-HSP.                        15530000
212700                                                                  15540000
212800     MOVE 00                 TO  PPS-RTC.                         15550000
212900     MOVE H-WAGE-INDEX       TO  PPS-WAGE-INDX.                   15560000
213000     MOVE H-ALOS             TO  PPS-AVG-LOS.                     15570000
213100     MOVE H-DAYS-CUTOFF      TO  PPS-DAYS-CUTOFF.                 15580000
213200                                                                  15590000
213300     MOVE B-LOS TO H-PERDIEM-DAYS.                                15600000
213400     IF H-PERDIEM-DAYS < 1                                        15610000
213500         MOVE 1 TO H-PERDIEM-DAYS.                                15620000
213600     ADD 1 TO H-PERDIEM-DAYS.                                     15630000
213700                                                                  15640000
213800     MOVE 1 TO H-DSCHG-FRCTN.                                     15650000
213900                                                                  15660000
214000     COMPUTE H-DRG-WT-FRCTN ROUNDED = H-DSCHG-FRCTN * H-DRG-WT.   15670000
214100                                                                  15680000
214200     IF (PAY-PERDIEM-DAYS  OR                                     15690000
214300         PAY-XFER-NO-COST) OR                                     15700000
214400        (PAY-XFER-SPEC-DRG AND                                    15710000
214500         B-DRG-POSTACUTE-PERDIEM)                                 15720000
214600         COMPUTE H-TRANSFER-ADJ ROUNDED = H-PERDIEM-DAYS / H-ALOS 15730000
214700         COMPUTE H-DSCHG-FRCTN  ROUNDED = H-PERDIEM-DAYS / H-ALOS 15740000
214800         IF H-DSCHG-FRCTN > 1                                     15750000
214900              MOVE 1 TO H-DSCHG-FRCTN                             15760000
215000              MOVE 1 TO H-TRANSFER-ADJ                            15770000
215100         ELSE                                                     15780000
215200              COMPUTE H-DRG-WT-FRCTN ROUNDED =                    15790000
215300                  (H-PERDIEM-DAYS / H-ALOS) * H-DRG-WT.           15800000
215400                                                                  15810000
215500     IF (PAY-XFER-SPEC-DRG AND                                    15820000
215600         B-DRG-POSTACUTE-50-50)                                   15830000
215700         COMPUTE H-TRANSFER-ADJ ROUNDED = H-PERDIEM-DAYS / H-ALOS 15840000
215800         COMPUTE H-DSCHG-FRCTN  ROUNDED =                         15850000
215900                        .5 + ((.5 * H-PERDIEM-DAYS) / H-ALOS)     15860000
216000         IF H-DSCHG-FRCTN > 1                                     15870000
216100              MOVE 1 TO H-DSCHG-FRCTN                             15880000
216200              MOVE 1 TO H-TRANSFER-ADJ                            15890000
216300         ELSE                                                     15900000
216400              COMPUTE H-DRG-WT-FRCTN ROUNDED =                    15910000
216500            (.5 + ((.5 * H-PERDIEM-DAYS) / H-ALOS)) * H-DRG-WT.   15920000
216600                                                                  15930000
216700                                                                  15940000
216800***********************************************************       15950000
216900***  CAPITAL DSH CALCULATION                                      15960000
217000***  CAPITAL DSH CALCULATION                                      15970000
217100                                                                  15980000
217200     MOVE 0 TO H-CAPI-DSH.                                        15990000
217300                                                                  16000000
217400     IF P-NEW-BED-SIZE NOT NUMERIC                                16010000
217500         MOVE 0 TO P-NEW-BED-SIZE.                                16020000
217600                                                                  16030000
217700     IF (W-CBSA-SIZE = 'O' OR 'L') AND P-NEW-BED-SIZE > 99        16040000
217800         COMPUTE H-CAPI-DSH ROUNDED = 2.7183 **                   16050000
217900                  (.2025 * (P-NEW-SSI-RATIO                       16060000
218000                          + P-NEW-MEDICAID-RATIO)) - 1.           16070000
218100                                                                  16080000
218200***********************************************************       16090000
218300***  CAPITAL IME TEACH CALCULATION                                16100000
218400***  CAPITAL IME TEACH CALCULATION                                16110000
218500                                                                  16120000
218600     MOVE 0 TO H-WK-CAPI-IME-TEACH.                               16130000
218700                                                                  16140000
218800     IF P-NEW-CAPI-IME NUMERIC                                    16150000
218900        IF P-NEW-CAPI-IME > 1.5000                                16160000
219000           MOVE 1.5000 TO P-NEW-CAPI-IME.                         16170000
219100                                                                  16180000
219200*****YEARCHANGE 2009.5 ****************************************   18470000
219300***                                                               16230000
219400***  PER POLICY, WE REMOVED THE .5 MULTIPLER                      16230000
219500***                                                               16230000
219600***********************************************************       16230000
219700     IF P-NEW-CAPI-IME NUMERIC                                    16190000
219800        COMPUTE H-WK-CAPI-IME-TEACH ROUNDED =                     16200000
219900         ((2.7183 ** (.2822 * P-NEW-CAPI-IME)) - 1).              16210000
220000                                                                  16220000
220100*****YEARCHANGE 2009.5 ****************************************   18470000
220200***********************************************************       16230000
220300     MOVE 0.00 TO H-DAYOUT-PCT.                                   16240000
220400     MOVE 0.80 TO H-CSTOUT-PCT.                                   16250000
220500                                                                  16260000
220600******************************************************************16270000
220700**                                                                16280000
220800** BURN DRGS FOR FY09 ARE 927, 928, 929, 933, 934 AND 935.        16281000
220900**                                                                16282000
221000******************************************************************16283000
221100                                                                  16284000
221200     IF  B-DRG = 927 OR 928 OR 929 OR 933 OR 934 OR 935           16285000
221300             MOVE 0.90 TO H-CSTOUT-PCT.                           16286000
221400                                                                  16287000
221500***     NATIONAL PERCENTAGE                                       16288000
221600     MOVE 0.6970   TO H-LABOR-PCT.                                16289000
221700     MOVE 0.3030   TO H-NONLABOR-PCT.                             16290000
221800                                                                  16300000
221900***     PUERTO RICO PERCENTAGE                                    16310000

222100     MOVE 0.3800   TO H-PR-NONLABOR-PCT.                          16330000
222200                                                                  16340000
222300     IF (H-WAGE-INDEX < 01.0000 OR                                16350000
222400         H-WAGE-INDEX = 01.0000)                                  16360000
222500        MOVE 0.6200 TO H-LABOR-PCT                                16370000
222600        MOVE 0.3800 TO H-NONLABOR-PCT.                            16380000
222700                                                                  16390000
222800     IF P-NEW-STATE = 40                                          16400000
222900       IF (H-PR-WAGE-INDEX < 01.0000 OR                           16410000
223000           H-PR-WAGE-INDEX = 01.0000)                             16420000
223100          MOVE 0.5870 TO H-PR-LABOR-PCT                           16430000
223200          MOVE 0.4130 TO H-PR-NONLABOR-PCT.                       16440000
223300                                                                  16450000
223400                                                                  16460000
223500     IF  P-NEW-OPER-CSTCHG-RATIO NUMERIC                          16470000
223600             MOVE P-NEW-OPER-CSTCHG-RATIO TO H-OPER-CSTCHG-RATIO  16480000
223700     ELSE                                                         16490000
223800             MOVE 0.000 TO H-OPER-CSTCHG-RATIO.                   16500000
223900                                                                  16510000
224000     IF P-NEW-CAPI-CSTCHG-RATIO NUMERIC                           16520000
224100             MOVE P-NEW-CAPI-CSTCHG-RATIO TO H-CAPI-CSTCHG-RATIO  16530000
224200     ELSE                                                         16540000
224300             MOVE 0.000 TO H-CAPI-CSTCHG-RATIO.                   16550000
224400                                                                  16560000
224500***********************************************************       16570000
224600*****YEARCHANGE 2009.1 ************************************       16570000
224700***  CAPITAL PAYMENT METHOD B - YEARCHNG                          16580000
224800***  CAPITAL PAYMENT METHOD B                                     16590000
224900                                                                  16600000
225000     IF W-CBSA-SIZE = 'L'                                         16610000
225100        MOVE 1.00 TO H-CAPI-LARG-URBAN                            16620000
225200     ELSE                                                         16630000
225300        MOVE 1.00 TO H-CAPI-LARG-URBAN.                           16640000
225400                                                                  16650000
225500     COMPUTE H-CAPI-GAF    ROUNDED = (H-WAGE-INDEX ** .6848).     16660000
225600     COMPUTE H-PR-CAPI-GAF ROUNDED = (H-PR-WAGE-INDEX ** .6848).  16670000
225700                                                                  16680000
225800*****YEARCHANGE 2009.1 ************************************       16570000
225900     COMPUTE H-FEDERAL-RATE ROUNDED =                             16690000
226000                                 (0424.17 * H-CAPI-GAF).          16700000
226100     COMPUTE H-PUERTO-RICO-RATE ROUNDED =                         16710000
226200                                 (0198.77 * H-PR-CAPI-GAF).       16720000
226300*****YEARCHANGE 2009.1 ************************************       16570000
226400                                                                  16730000
226500     COMPUTE H-CAPI-COLA ROUNDED =                                16740000
226600                     (.3152 * (H-OPER-COLA - 1) + 1).             16750000
226700                                                                  16760000
226800     MOVE H-FEDERAL-RATE TO H-CAPI-FED-RATE.                      16770000
226900                                                                  16780000

227200                 (H-NAT-PCT * H-FEDERAL-RATE) +                   16810000
227300                 (H-REG-PCT * H-PUERTO-RICO-RATE).                16820000
227400***********************************************************       16830000
227500***  CAPITAL FSP CALCULATION                                      16840000
227600***  CAPITAL FSP CALCULATION                                      16850000
227700                                                                  16860000

227900                               H-DRG-WT * H-CAPI-FED-RATE *       16880000
228000                               H-CAPI-COLA *                      16890000
228100                               H-CAPI-LARG-URBAN.                 16900000
228200                                                                  16910000
228300***********************************************************       16920000
228400***  CAPITAL PAYMENT METHOD A                                     16930000
228500***  CAPITAL PAYMENT METHOD A                                     16940000
228600                                                                  16950000

229100                                                                  17000000
229200***********************************************************       17010000

229800                    H-CAPI-SCH).                                  17070000
229900                                                                  17080000

230100        IF PAY-PERDIEM-DAYS                                       17100000
230200            IF  H-PERDIEM-DAYS < H-ALOS                           17110000

230400                    PERFORM 3500-CALC-PERDIEM-AMT                 17130000

241700           (H-NAT-PCT * (H-NAT-LABOR * H-WAGE-INDEX +             18260000
241800            H-NAT-NONLABOR * H-OPER-COLA) * H-DRG-WT)             18270000
241900                   ON SIZE ERROR MOVE 0 TO H-OPER-FSP-PART.       18280000
242000                                                                  18290000

242400            H-NAT-NONLABOR * H-OPER-COLA) * H-DRG-WT)             18330000
242500                           +                                      18340000
242600           (H-REG-PCT * (H-REG-LABOR * H-PR-WAGE-INDEX +          18350000
242700            H-REG-NONLABOR * H-OPER-COLA) * H-DRG-WT)             18360000
242800                   ON SIZE ERROR MOVE 0 TO H-OPER-FSP-PART.       18370000

243100 3450-CALC-ADDITIONAL-HSP.                                        18400000
243200***********************************************************       18410000
243300*    OBRA 89 CALCULATE ADDITIONAL HSP PAYMENT FOR                 18420000
243400*    SOLE COMMUNITY                                               18430000
243500*    AND ESSENTIAL ACCESS COMMUNITY HOSPITALS (EACH)              18440000
243600*    NOW REIMBURSED WITH 100% NATIONAL FEDERAL RATES              18450000
243700***********************************************************       18460000
243800*****YEARCHANGE 2009.1 ****************************************   18470000
243900***         GET THE UPDATING FACTOR                               18480000
244000***         GET THE UPDATING FACTOR                               18490000
244100                                                                  18500000
244200     MOVE 0.995743 TO H-BUDG-NUTR08.                              18510000
244300*****YEARCHANGE 2009.1 ****************************************   18470000
244400     MOVE 0.998795 TO H-BUDG-NUTR09.                              18510000
244500*****YEARCHANGE 2009.1 ****************************************   18470000
244600                                                                  18520000
244700     MOVE 1.0330 TO H-UPDATE-08.                                  18530000
244800
244900     IF P-NEW-CBSA-HOSP-QUAL-IND = '1'
245000*****YEARCHANGE 2009.0 ****************************************   18470000
245100        MOVE 1.0360 TO H-UPDATE-09
245200     ELSE
245300        MOVE 1.0160 TO H-UPDATE-09.
245400*****YEARCHANGE 2009.0 ****************************************   18470000
245500
245600     COMPUTE H-UPDATE-FACTOR ROUNDED =
245700                       (H-UPDATE-08 * H-UPDATE-09 *
245800                        H-BUDG-NUTR08 * H-BUDG-NUTR09).
245900
246000     COMPUTE H-HSP-RATE ROUNDED =
246100         H-FAC-SPEC-RATE * H-UPDATE-FACTOR.
246200***************************************************************
246300*
246400*    IF P-NEW-CBSA-HOSP-QUAL-IND = '1'                            18537000
246500*       COMPUTE H-HSP-RATE ROUNDED =                              18538000
246600*        (H-FAC-SPEC-RATE * 1) * H-UPDATE-FACTOR                  18539000
246700*    ELSE                                                         18540000
246800*       COMPUTE H-HSP-RATE ROUNDED =                              18550000
246900*        ((H-FAC-SPEC-RATE / 1.036) * 1.016) * H-UPDATE-FACTOR.   18560000
247000*                                                                 18570000
247100***************************************************************   18580000
247200********YEARCHANGE 2009.1 *************************************   18590000
