249000                                                                  18620000
249100********YEARCHANGE 2009.1 *************************************   18590000
249200                                                                  18650000
249300***************************************************************   18660000
249400     COMPUTE H-FSP-RATE ROUNDED =                                 18670000
249500         (H-NAT-PCT * (H-NAT-LABOR * H-WAGE-INDEX +               18680000
249600         H-NAT-NONLABOR * H-OPER-COLA))                           18690000
249700                           *                                      18700000
249800     ((1 + H-OPER-IME-TEACH + H-OPER-DSH) / H-OUTLIER-OFFSET-NAT) 18710000
249900                   ON SIZE ERROR MOVE 0 TO H-FSP-RATE.            18720000
250000                                                                  18730000
250100     IF P-NEW-STATE = 40                                          18740000
250200       COMPUTE H-FSP-RATE ROUNDED =                               18750000
250300        (((H-NAT-PCT * (H-NAT-LABOR * H-WAGE-INDEX +              18760000
250400         H-NAT-NONLABOR * H-OPER-COLA))                           18770000
250500                         *                                        18771000
250600        ((1 + H-OPER-IME-TEACH + H-OPER-DSH) /                    18772000
250700                            H-OUTLIER-OFFSET-NAT) )               18773000
250800                           +                                      18780000
250900          (H-REG-PCT * (H-REG-LABOR * H-PR-WAGE-INDEX +           18790000
251000         H-REG-NONLABOR * H-OPER-COLA)))                          18800000
251100                           *                                      18810000
251200      ((1 + H-OPER-IME-TEACH + H-OPER-DSH) / H-OUTLIER-OFFSET-PR) 18820000
251300                   ON SIZE ERROR MOVE 0 TO H-FSP-RATE.            18830000
251400                                                                  18840000
251500                                                                  18850000
251600     IF  H-HSP-RATE > H-FSP-RATE                                  18860000
251700           COMPUTE H-OPER-HSP-PART ROUNDED =                      18870000
251800             (H-HSP-RATE - H-FSP-RATE) * H-DRG-WT                 18880000
251900                   ON SIZE ERROR MOVE 0 TO H-OPER-HSP-PART        18890000
252000     ELSE                                                         18900000
252100         MOVE 0 TO H-OPER-HSP-PART.                               18910000
252200                                                                  18920000
252300***************************************************************   18930000
252400***         GET THE MDH REBASE                                    18940000
252500                                                                  18950000
252600     IF  H-HSP-RATE > H-FSP-RATE                                  18960000
252700         IF P-NEW-PROVIDER-TYPE = '14' OR '15'                    18970000
252800           COMPUTE H-OPER-HSP-PART ROUNDED =                      18980000
252900             (H-HSP-RATE - H-FSP-RATE) * H-DRG-WT * .75           18990000
253000                   ON SIZE ERROR MOVE 0 TO H-OPER-HSP-PART.       19000000
253100                                                                  19010000
253200 3500-CALC-PERDIEM-AMT.                                           19020000
253300***********************************************************       19030000
253400***  REVIEW CODE = 03 OR 06                                       19040000
253500***  OPERATING PERDIEM-AMT CALCULATION                            19050000
253600***  OPERATING HSP AND FSP CALCULATION FOR TRANSFERS              19060000
253700                                                                  19070000
253800        COMPUTE H-OPER-FSP-PART ROUNDED =                         19080000
253900        H-OPER-FSP-PART * H-TRANSFER-ADJ                          19090000
254000        ON SIZE ERROR MOVE 0 TO H-OPER-FSP-PART.                  19100000
254100                                                                  19110000
254200***********************************************************       19120000
254300***********************************************************       19130000
254400***  REVIEW CODE = 03 OR 06                                       19140000
254500***  CAPITAL   PERDIEM-AMT CALCULATION                            19150000
254600***  CAPITAL   HSP AND FSP CALCULATION FOR TRANSFERS              19160000
254700                                                                  19170000
254800        COMPUTE H-CAPI-FSP-PART ROUNDED =                         19180000
254900        H-CAPI-FSP-PART * H-TRANSFER-ADJ                          19190000
255000        ON SIZE ERROR MOVE 0 TO H-CAPI-FSP-PART.                  19200000
255100                                                                  19210000
255200***********************************************************       19220000
255300***  REVIEW CODE = 03 OR 06                                       19230000
255400***  CAPITAL PERDIEM-AMT, OLD-HARMLESS CALCULATION                19240000
255500***  CAPITAL PERDIEM-AMT, OLD-HARMLESS CALCULATION                19250000
255600                                                                  19260000
255700        COMPUTE H-CAPI-OLD-HARMLESS ROUNDED =                     19270000
255800        H-CAPI-OLD-HARMLESS * H-TRANSFER-ADJ                      19280000
255900        ON SIZE ERROR MOVE 0 TO H-CAPI-OLD-HARMLESS.              19290000
256000                                                                  19300000
256100 3550-CALC-PERDIEM-AMT.                                           19310000
256200***********************************************************       19320000
256300***  REVIEW CODE = 09  OR 11 TRANSFER WITH SPECIAL DRG            19330000
256400***  OPERATING PERDIEM-AMT CALCULATION                            19340000
256500***  OPERATING HSP AND FSP CALCULATION FOR TRANSFERS              19350000
256600                                                                  19360000
256700     IF (B-DRG-POSTACUTE-50-50)                                   19370000
256800        MOVE 10 TO PPS-RTC                                        19380000
256900        COMPUTE H-OPER-FSP-PART ROUNDED =                         19390000
257000        H-OPER-FSP-PART * (.5 * (1 + H-TRANSFER-ADJ))             19400000
257100        ON SIZE ERROR MOVE 0 TO H-OPER-FSP-PART.                  19410000
257200                                                                  19420000
257300     IF (B-DRG-POSTACUTE-PERDIEM)                                 19430000
257400        MOVE 12 TO PPS-RTC                                        19440000
257500        COMPUTE H-OPER-FSP-PART ROUNDED =                         19450000
257600        H-OPER-FSP-PART *  H-TRANSFER-ADJ                         19460000
257700        ON SIZE ERROR MOVE 0 TO H-OPER-FSP-PART.                  19470000
257800                                                                  19480000
257900***********************************************************       19490000
258000***  CAPITAL PERDIEM-AMT CALCULATION                              19500000
258100***  CAPITAL HSP AND FSP CALCULATION FOR TRANSFERS                19510000
258200                                                                  19520000
258300     IF (B-DRG-POSTACUTE-50-50)                                   19530000
258400        MOVE 10 TO PPS-RTC                                        19540000
258500        COMPUTE H-CAPI-FSP-PART ROUNDED =                         19550000
258600        H-CAPI-FSP-PART * (.5 * (1 + H-TRANSFER-ADJ))             19560000
258700        ON SIZE ERROR MOVE 0 TO H-CAPI-FSP-PART.                  19570000
258800                                                                  19580000
258900     IF (B-DRG-POSTACUTE-PERDIEM)                                 19590000
259000        MOVE 12 TO PPS-RTC                                        19600000
259100        COMPUTE H-CAPI-FSP-PART ROUNDED =                         19610000
259200        H-CAPI-FSP-PART *  H-TRANSFER-ADJ                         19620000
259300        ON SIZE ERROR MOVE 0 TO H-CAPI-FSP-PART.                  19630000
259400                                                                  19640000
259500***********************************************************       19650000
259600***  CAPITAL PERDIEM-AMT, OLD-HARMLESS CALCULATION                19660000
259700***  CAPITAL PERDIEM-AMT, OLD-HARMLESS CALCULATION                19670000
259800                                                                  19680000
259900     IF (B-DRG-POSTACUTE-50-50)                                   19690000
260000        MOVE 10 TO PPS-RTC                                        19700000
260100        COMPUTE H-CAPI-OLD-HARMLESS ROUNDED =                     19710000
260200        H-CAPI-OLD-HARMLESS * (.5 * (1 + H-TRANSFER-ADJ))         19720000
260300        ON SIZE ERROR MOVE 0 TO H-CAPI-OLD-HARMLESS.              19730000
260400                                                                  19740000
260500     IF (B-DRG-POSTACUTE-PERDIEM)                                 19750000
260600        MOVE 12 TO PPS-RTC                                        19760000
260700        COMPUTE H-CAPI-OLD-HARMLESS ROUNDED =                     19770000
260800        H-CAPI-OLD-HARMLESS *  H-TRANSFER-ADJ                     19780000
260900        ON SIZE ERROR MOVE 0 TO H-CAPI-OLD-HARMLESS.              19790000
261000                                                                  19800000
261100 3560-CHECK-RTN-CODE.                                             19810000
261200                                                                  19820000
261300     IF (B-DRG-POSTACUTE-50-50)                                   19830000
261400        MOVE 10 TO PPS-RTC.                                       19840000
261500     IF (B-DRG-POSTACUTE-PERDIEM)                                 19850000
261600        MOVE 12 TO PPS-RTC.                                       19860000
261700                                                                  19870000
261800 3560-EXIT.    EXIT.                                              19880000
261900                                                                  19890000
262000 3600-CALC-OUTLIER.                                               19900000
262100***********************************************************       19910000
262200***  COST OUTLIER OPERATING AND CAPITAL CALCULATION               19920000
262300***  COST OUTLIER OPERATING AND CAPITAL CALCULATION               19930000
262400                                                                  19940000
262500     IF OUTLIER-RECON-FLAG = 'Y'                                  19950000
262600        COMPUTE H-OPER-CSTCHG-RATIO ROUNDED =                     19960000
262700               (H-OPER-CSTCHG-RATIO + .2).                        19970000
262800                                                                  19980000
262900     IF H-CAPI-CSTCHG-RATIO > 0 OR                                19990000
263000       H-OPER-CSTCHG-RATIO > 0                                    20000000
263100        COMPUTE H-OPER-SHARE-DOLL-THRESHOLD ROUNDED =             20010000
263200                H-OPER-CSTCHG-RATIO /                             20020000
263300               (H-OPER-CSTCHG-RATIO + H-CAPI-CSTCHG-RATIO)        20030000
263400        COMPUTE H-CAPI-SHARE-DOLL-THRESHOLD ROUNDED =             20040000
263500                H-CAPI-CSTCHG-RATIO /                             20050000
263600               (H-OPER-CSTCHG-RATIO + H-CAPI-CSTCHG-RATIO)        20060000
263700     ELSE                                                         20070000
263800         MOVE 0 TO H-OPER-SHARE-DOLL-THRESHOLD                    20080000
263900                   H-CAPI-SHARE-DOLL-THRESHOLD.                   20090000
264000                                                                  20100000
264100***********************************************************       20110000
264200*****YEARCHANGE 2009.1 ************************************       20110000
264300***  OUTLIER THRESHOLD AMOUNTS                                    20120000
264400***  OUTLIER THRESHOLD AMOUNTS                                    20130000
264500                                                                  20140000
264600*****YEARCHANGE 2009.1 ************************************       20110000
264700                                                                  20140000
264800     MOVE 20045.00 TO H-CST-THRESH.                               20150000
264900                                                                  20140000
265000*****YEARCHANGE 2009.1 ************************************       20110000
265100                                                                  20160000
265200     IF (B-REVIEW-CODE = '03') AND                                20170000
265300         H-PERDIEM-DAYS < H-ALOS                                  20180000
265400        COMPUTE H-CST-THRESH ROUNDED =                            20190000
265500                      (H-CST-THRESH * H-TRANSFER-ADJ)             20200000
265600                ON SIZE ERROR MOVE 0 TO H-CST-THRESH.             20210000
265700                                                                  20220000
265800     IF ((B-REVIEW-CODE = '09') AND                               20230000
265900         (H-PERDIEM-DAYS < H-ALOS))                               20240000
266000         IF (B-DRG-POSTACUTE-PERDIEM)                             20250000
266100            COMPUTE H-CST-THRESH ROUNDED =                        20260000
266200                      (H-CST-THRESH * H-TRANSFER-ADJ)             20270000
266300                ON SIZE ERROR MOVE 0 TO H-CST-THRESH.             20280000
266400                                                                  20290000
266500     IF ((B-REVIEW-CODE = '09') AND                               20300000
266600         (H-PERDIEM-DAYS < H-ALOS))                               20310000
266700         IF (B-DRG-POSTACUTE-50-50)                               20320000
266800           COMPUTE H-CST-THRESH ROUNDED =                         20330000
266900          (H-CST-THRESH * (.5 * (1 + H-TRANSFER-ADJ)))            20340000
267000                ON SIZE ERROR MOVE 0 TO H-CST-THRESH.             20350000
267100                                                                  20360000
267200     COMPUTE H-OPER-DOLLAR-THRESHOLD ROUNDED =                    20370000
267300        ((H-CST-THRESH * H-LABOR-PCT * H-WAGE-INDEX) +            20380000
267400         (H-CST-THRESH * H-NONLABOR-PCT * H-OPER-COLA)) *         20390000
267500          H-OPER-SHARE-DOLL-THRESHOLD.                            20400000
267600                                                                  20410000
267700     IF P-NEW-STATE = 40                                          20420000
267800        COMPUTE H-OPER-PR-DOLLAR-THRESHOLD ROUNDED =              20430000
267900           ((H-CST-THRESH * H-PR-LABOR-PCT * H-PR-WAGE-INDEX) +   20440000
268000            (H-CST-THRESH * H-PR-NONLABOR-PCT * H-OPER-COLA)) *   20450000
268100             H-OPER-SHARE-DOLL-THRESHOLD                          20460000
268200        COMPUTE H-OPER-DOLLAR-THRESHOLD ROUNDED =                 20470000
268300               (H-OPER-DOLLAR-THRESHOLD * H-NAT-PCT) +            20480000
268400               (H-OPER-PR-DOLLAR-THRESHOLD * H-REG-PCT).          20490000
268500                                                                  20500000
268600***********************************************************       20510000
268700                                                                  20520000
268800     COMPUTE H-CAPI-DOLLAR-THRESHOLD ROUNDED =                    20530000
268900          H-CST-THRESH * H-CAPI-GAF * H-CAPI-LARG-URBAN *         20540000
269000          H-CAPI-SHARE-DOLL-THRESHOLD * H-CAPI-COLA.              20550000
269100                                                                  20560000
269200                                                                  20570000
269300     IF P-NEW-STATE = 40                                          20580000
269400        COMPUTE H-CAPI-PR-DOLLAR-THRESHOLD ROUNDED =              20590000
269500           H-CST-THRESH * H-PR-CAPI-GAF * H-CAPI-LARG-URBAN *     20600000
269600           H-CAPI-SHARE-DOLL-THRESHOLD * H-CAPI-COLA              20610000
269700        COMPUTE H-CAPI-DOLLAR-THRESHOLD ROUNDED =                 20620000
269800               (H-CAPI-DOLLAR-THRESHOLD * H-NAT-PCT) +            20630000
269900               (H-CAPI-PR-DOLLAR-THRESHOLD * H-REG-PCT).          20640000
270000                                                                  20650000
270100                                                                  20660000
270200     COMPUTE H-OPER-COST-OUTLIER ROUNDED =                        20670000
270300      (H-OPER-FSP-PART * (1 + H-OPER-IME-TEACH + H-OPER-DSH))     20680000
270400                       +                                          20690000
270500             H-OPER-DOLLAR-THRESHOLD                              20700000
270600                       +                                          20710000
270700                 H-NEW-TECH-PAY-ADD-ON.                           20720000
270800                                                                  20730000
270900     COMPUTE H-CAPI-COST-OUTLIER ROUNDED =                        20740000
271000      (H-CAPI-FSP-PART * (1 + H-WK-CAPI-IME-TEACH + H-CAPI-DSH))  20750000
271100                       +                                          20760000
271200             H-CAPI-DOLLAR-THRESHOLD.                             20770000
271300                                                                  20780000
271400     IF (P-NEW-CAPI-NEW-HOSP = 'Y')                               20790000
271500         MOVE 0 TO H-CAPI-COST-OUTLIER.                           20800000
271600                                                                  20810000
271700                                                                  20820000
271800***********************************************************       20830000
271900***  OPERATING COST CALCULATION                                   20840000
272000***  OPERATING COST CALCULATION                                   20850000
272100                                                                  20860000
272200     COMPUTE H-OPER-BILL-COSTS ROUNDED =                          20870000
272300         B-CHARGES-CLAIMED * H-OPER-CSTCHG-RATIO                  20880000
272400         ON SIZE ERROR MOVE 0 TO H-OPER-BILL-COSTS.               20890000
272500                                                                  20900000
272600                                                                  20910000
272700     IF  H-OPER-BILL-COSTS > H-OPER-COST-OUTLIER                  20920000
272800         COMPUTE H-OPER-OUTCST-PART ROUNDED =                     20930000
272900         H-CSTOUT-PCT * (H-OPER-BILL-COSTS -                      20940000
273000                         H-OPER-COST-OUTLIER).                    20950000
273100                                                                  20960000
273200     IF PAY-WITHOUT-COST OR                                       20970000
273300        PAY-XFER-NO-COST OR                                       20980000
273400        PAY-XFER-SPEC-DRG-NO-COST                                 20990000
273500         MOVE 0 TO H-OPER-OUTCST-PART.                            21000000
273600                                                                  21010000
273700***********************************************************       21020000
273800***  CAPITAL COST CALCULATION                                     21030000
273900***  CAPITAL COST CALCULATION                                     21040000
274000                                                                  21050000
274100     COMPUTE H-CAPI-BILL-COSTS ROUNDED =                          21060000
274200             B-CHARGES-CLAIMED * H-CAPI-CSTCHG-RATIO              21070000
274300         ON SIZE ERROR MOVE 0 TO H-CAPI-BILL-COSTS.               21080000
274400                                                                  21090000
274500     IF  H-CAPI-BILL-COSTS > H-CAPI-COST-OUTLIER                  21100000
274600         COMPUTE H-CAPI-OUTCST-PART ROUNDED =                     21110000
274700         H-CSTOUT-PCT * (H-CAPI-BILL-COSTS -                      21120000
274800                         H-CAPI-COST-OUTLIER).                    21130000
274900                                                                  21140000
275000     IF P-NEW-CAPI-PPS-PAY-CODE = 'A'                             21150000
275100       COMPUTE H-CAPI-OUTCST-PART ROUNDED =                       21160000
275200              (H-CAPI-OUTCST-PART * P-NEW-CAPI-NEW-HARM-RATIO).   21170000
275300                                                                  21180000
275400     IF P-NEW-CAPI-PPS-PAY-CODE = 'C'                             21190000
275500        COMPUTE H-CAPI-OUTCST-PART ROUNDED =                      21200000
275600               (H-CAPI-OUTCST-PART * H-CAPI-PAYCDE-PCT1).         21210000
275700                                                                  21220000
275800     IF (H-CAPI-BILL-COSTS   + H-OPER-BILL-COSTS) <               21230000
275900        (H-CAPI-COST-OUTLIER + H-OPER-COST-OUTLIER)               21240000
276000        MOVE 0 TO H-CAPI-OUTCST-PART                              21250000
276100                  H-OPER-OUTCST-PART.                             21260000
276200                                                                  21270000
276300     IF PAY-WITHOUT-COST OR                                       21280000
276400        PAY-XFER-NO-COST OR                                       21290000
276500        PAY-XFER-SPEC-DRG-NO-COST                                 21300000
276600         MOVE 0 TO H-CAPI-OUTCST-PART.                            21310000
276700                                                                  21320000
276800***********************************************************       21330000
276900***  DETERMINES THE BILL TO BE COST  OUTLIER                      21340000
277000                                                                  21350000
277100     IF (P-NEW-CAPI-NEW-HOSP = 'Y')                               21360000
277200         MOVE 0 TO H-CAPI-OUTDAY-PART                             21370000
277300                   H-CAPI-OUTCST-PART.                            21380000
277400                                                                  21390000
277500     IF (H-OPER-OUTCST-PART + H-CAPI-OUTCST-PART) > 0             21400000
277600                 MOVE H-OPER-OUTCST-PART TO                       21410000
277700                      H-OPER-OUTLIER-PART                         21420000
277800                 MOVE H-CAPI-OUTCST-PART TO                       21430000
277900                      H-CAPI-OUTLIER-PART                         21440000
278000                 MOVE 02 TO PPS-RTC.                              21450000
278100                                                                  21460000
278200     IF OUTLIER-RECON-FLAG = 'Y'                                  21470000
278300        IF (H-OPER-OUTCST-PART + H-CAPI-OUTCST-PART) > 0          21480000
278400           COMPUTE HLD-PPS-RTC = HLD-PPS-RTC + 30                 21490000
278500           GO TO 3600-EXIT                                        21500000
278600        ELSE                                                      21510000
278700           GO TO 3600-EXIT                                        21520000
278800     ELSE                                                         21530000
278900        NEXT SENTENCE.                                            21540000
279000                                                                  21550000
279100                                                                  21560000
279200***********************************************************       21570000
279300***  DETERMINES IF COST OUTLIER                                   21580000
279400***  RECOMPUTES DOLLAR THRESHOLD TO BE SENT BACK WITH             21590000
279500***         RETURN CODE OF 02                                     21600000
279600                                                                  21610000
279700     MOVE 0 TO H-OPER-DOLLAR-THRESHOLD.                           21620000
279800                                                                  21630000
279900     IF PPS-RTC = 02                                              21640000
280000             COMPUTE H-OPER-DOLLAR-THRESHOLD ROUNDED =            21650000
280100                     (H-CAPI-COST-OUTLIER  +                      21660000
280200                      H-OPER-COST-OUTLIER)                        21670000
280300                             /                                    21680000
280400                    (H-CAPI-CSTCHG-RATIO  +                       21690000
280500                     H-OPER-CSTCHG-RATIO)                         21700000
280600             ON SIZE ERROR MOVE 0 TO H-OPER-DOLLAR-THRESHOLD.     21710000
280700                                                                  21720000
280800***********************************************************       21730000
280900***  DETERMINES IF COST OUTLIER WITH LOS IS > COVERED  DAYS       21740000
281000***         RETURN CODE OF 67                                     21750000
281100                                                                  21760000
281200     IF PPS-RTC = 02                                              21770000
281300         IF ((H-REG-DAYS + H-LTR-DAYS) < B-LOS) OR                21780000
281400            PPS-PC-COT-FLAG = 'Y'                                 21790000
281500             MOVE 67 TO PPS-RTC.                                  21800000
281600***********************************************************       21810000
281700                                                                  21820000
281800***********************************************************       21830000
281900***  DETERMINES THE OUTLIER AMOUNT THAT WOULD BE PAID IF          21840000
282000***  THE PROVIDER WAS TYPE B-HOLD-HARMLESS 100% FED RATE          21850000
282100                                                                  21860000
282200     IF P-NEW-CAPI-PPS-PAY-CODE = 'A'                             21870000
282300        COMPUTE H-CAPI2-B-OUTLIER-PART ROUNDED =                  21880000
282400                H-CAPI-OUTLIER-PART / P-NEW-CAPI-NEW-HARM-RATIO   21890000
282500         ON SIZE ERROR MOVE 0 TO H-CAPI2-B-OUTLIER-PART.          21900000
282600                                                                  21910000
282700     IF P-NEW-CAPI-PPS-PAY-CODE = 'B'                             21920000
282800        COMPUTE H-CAPI2-B-OUTLIER-PART ROUNDED =                  21930000
282900                H-CAPI-OUTLIER-PART.                              21940000
283000                                                                  21950000
283100     IF P-NEW-CAPI-PPS-PAY-CODE = 'C'                             21960000
283200        COMPUTE H-CAPI2-B-OUTLIER-PART ROUNDED =                  21970000
283300                H-CAPI-OUTLIER-PART / H-CAPI-PAYCDE-PCT1          21980000
283400         ON SIZE ERROR MOVE 0 TO H-CAPI2-B-OUTLIER-PART.          21990000
283500                                                                  22000000
283600 3600-EXIT.   EXIT.                                               22010000
283700                                                                  22020000
283800***********************************************************       22030000
283900 3800-CALC-TOT-AMT.                                               22040000
284000***********************************************************       22050000
284100***  CALCULATE TOTALS FOR CAPITAL                                 22060000
284200***  CALCULATE TOTALS FOR CAPITAL                                 22070000
284300                                                                  22080000
284400     MOVE P-NEW-CAPI-PPS-PAY-CODE  TO H-CAPI2-PAY-CODE.           22090000
284500                                                                  22100000
284600     IF P-NEW-CAPI-PPS-PAY-CODE = 'A'                             22110000
284700        MOVE P-NEW-CAPI-NEW-HARM-RATIO TO H-CAPI-FSP-PCT          22120000
284800        MOVE 0.00 TO H-CAPI-HSP-PCT.                              22130000
284900                                                                  22140000
285000     IF P-NEW-CAPI-PPS-PAY-CODE = 'B'                             22150000
285100        MOVE 0    TO H-CAPI-OLD-HARMLESS                          22160000
285200        MOVE 1.00 TO H-CAPI-FSP-PCT                               22170000
285300        MOVE 0.00 TO H-CAPI-HSP-PCT.                              22180000
285400                                                                  22190000
285500     IF P-NEW-CAPI-PPS-PAY-CODE = 'C'                             22200000
285600        MOVE 0    TO H-CAPI-OLD-HARMLESS                          22210000
285700        MOVE H-CAPI-PAYCDE-PCT1 TO H-CAPI-FSP-PCT                 22220000
285800        MOVE H-CAPI-PAYCDE-PCT2 TO H-CAPI-HSP-PCT.                22230000
285900                                                                  22240000
286000     COMPUTE H-CAPI-HSP ROUNDED =                                 22250000
286100         H-CAPI-HSP-PCT * H-CAPI-HSP-PART.                        22260000
286200                                                                  22270000
286300     COMPUTE H-CAPI-FSP ROUNDED =                                 22280000
286400         H-CAPI-FSP-PCT * H-CAPI-FSP-PART.                        22290000
286500                                                                  22300000
286600     MOVE P-NEW-CAPI-EXCEPTIONS TO H-CAPI-EXCEPTIONS.             22310000
286700                                                                  22320000
286800     MOVE H-CAPI-OLD-HARMLESS TO H-CAPI-OLD-HARM.                 22330000
286900                                                                  22340000
287000     COMPUTE H-CAPI-DSH-ADJ ROUNDED =                             22350000
287100             H-CAPI-FSP                                           22360000
287200              * H-CAPI-DSH.                                       22370000
287300                                                                  22380000
287400     COMPUTE H-CAPI-IME-ADJ ROUNDED =                             22390000
287500          H-CAPI-FSP *                                            22400000
287600                 H-WK-CAPI-IME-TEACH.                             22410000
287700                                                                  22420000
287800     COMPUTE H-CAPI-OUTLIER ROUNDED =                             22430000
287900             1.00 * H-CAPI-OUTLIER-PART.                          22440000
288000                                                                  22450000
288100     COMPUTE H-CAPI2-B-FSP ROUNDED =                              22460000
288200             1.00 * H-CAPI2-B-FSP-PART.                           22470000
288300                                                                  22480000
288400     COMPUTE H-CAPI2-B-OUTLIER ROUNDED =                          22490000
288500             1.00 * H-CAPI2-B-OUTLIER-PART.                       22500000
288600***********************************************************       22510000
288700***  IF CAPITAL IS NOT IN EFFECT FOR GIVEN PROVIDER               22520000
288800***        THIS ZEROES OUT ALL CAPITAL DATA                       22530000
288900                                                                  22540000
289000     IF (P-NEW-CAPI-NEW-HOSP = 'Y')                               22550000
289100        MOVE ALL '0' TO HOLD-CAPITAL-VARIABLES.                   22560000
289200***********************************************************       22570000
289300                                                                  22580000
289400***********************************************************       22590000
289500***  CALCULATE FINAL TOTALS FOR OPERATING                         22600000
289600***  CALCULATE FINAL TOTALS FOR OPERATING                         22610000
289700                                                                  22620000
289800     IF (H-CAPI-OUTLIER > 0 AND                                   22630000
289900         PPS-OPER-OUTLIER-PART = 0)                               22640000
290000            COMPUTE PPS-OPER-OUTLIER-PART =                       22650000
290100                    PPS-OPER-OUTLIER-PART + .01.                  22660000
290200                                                                  22670000
290300     MOVE 01.000 TO WK-LOW-VOL25PCT.                              22680000
290400                                                                  22690000
290500     IF P-NEW-TEMP-RELIEF-IND = 'Y'                               22700000
290600        MOVE 01.250 TO WK-LOW-VOL25PCT.                           22710000
290700                                                                  22720000
290800     MOVE ZERO TO PPS-OPER-DSH-ADJ.                               22730000
290900                                                                  22740000
291000     IF  H-OPER-DSH NUMERIC                                       22750000
291100         COMPUTE PPS-OPER-DSH-ADJ ROUNDED =                       22760000
291200       (WK-LOW-VOL25PCT * PPS-OPER-FSP-PART) * H-OPER-DSH.        22770000
291300                                                                  22780000
291400     COMPUTE PPS-OPER-IME-ADJ ROUNDED =                           22790000
291500      (WK-LOW-VOL25PCT * PPS-OPER-FSP-PART) * H-OPER-IME-TEACH.   22800000
291600                                                                  22810000
291700                                                                  22820000
291800     COMPUTE PPS-OPER-FSP-PART ROUNDED =                          22830000
291900        (WK-LOW-VOL25PCT * H-OPER-FSP-PART) * H-OPER-FSP-PCT.     22840000
292000                                                                  22850000
292100     COMPUTE PPS-OPER-HSP-PART ROUNDED =                          22860000
292200        (WK-LOW-VOL25PCT * H-OPER-HSP-PART) * H-OPER-HSP-PCT.     22870000
292300                                                                  22880000
292400     COMPUTE PPS-OPER-OUTLIER-PART ROUNDED =                      22890000
292500      (WK-LOW-VOL25PCT * H-OPER-OUTLIER-PART) * H-OPER-FSP-PCT.   22900000
292600                                                                  22910000
292700     IF HMO-TAG  = 'Y'                                            22920000
292800        PERFORM 3850-HMO-IME-ADJ.                                 22930000
292900                                                                  22940000
293000***********************************************************       22950000
293100***  CALCULATE FINAL TOTALS FOR CAPITAL AND OPERATING             22960000
293200***  CALCULATE FINAL TOTALS FOR CAPITAL AND OPERATING             22970000
293300                                                                  22980000
293400     COMPUTE H-CAPI-TOTAL-PAY ROUNDED =                           22990000
293500            (H-CAPI-HSP + H-CAPI-FSP + H-CAPI-EXCEPTIONS +        23000000
293600             H-CAPI-OUTLIER + H-CAPI-DSH-ADJ +                    23010000
293700             H-CAPI-IME-ADJ + H-CAPI-OLD-HARM) * WK-LOW-VOL25PCT. 23020000
293800                                                                  23030000
293900     COMPUTE H-NEW-TECH-PAY-ADD-ON ROUNDED =                      23040000
294000             (WK-LOW-VOL25PCT * H-NEW-TECH-PAY-ADD-ON).           23050000
294100                                                                  23060000

294400                                                                  23090000

295200                                                                  23152000

298400                                                                  23400000
298500***  OPERATING DSH CALCULATION                                    23410000
298600***  OPERATING DSH CALCULATION                                    23420000
298700                                                                  23430000
298800      MOVE 0.0000 TO H-OPER-DSH.                                  23440000
298900                                                                  23450000
299000      COMPUTE H-WK-OPER-DSH ROUNDED  = (P-NEW-SSI-RATIO           23460000
299100                                     + P-NEW-MEDICAID-RATIO).     23470000
299200                                                                  23480000
299300***********************************************************       23490000
299400**1**    0-99 BEDS                                                23500000
299500***  NOT TO EXCEED 12%                                            23510000
299600                                                                  23520000
299700      IF (W-CBSA-SIZE = 'O' OR 'L') AND P-NEW-BED-SIZE < 100      23530000
299800                               AND H-WK-OPER-DSH > .1499          23540000
299900                               AND H-WK-OPER-DSH < .2020          23550000
300000        COMPUTE H-OPER-DSH ROUNDED = (H-WK-OPER-DSH - .15)        23560000
300100                                      * .65 + .025                23570000
300200        IF H-OPER-DSH > .1200  MOVE .1200 TO H-OPER-DSH.          23580000
300300                                                                  23590000
300400      IF (W-CBSA-SIZE = 'O' OR 'L') AND P-NEW-BED-SIZE < 100      23600000
300500                               AND H-WK-OPER-DSH > .2019          23610000
300600        COMPUTE H-OPER-DSH ROUNDED = (H-WK-OPER-DSH - .202)       23620000
300700                                      * .825 + .0588              23630000
300800        IF H-OPER-DSH > .1200  MOVE .1200 TO H-OPER-DSH.          23640000
300900                                                                  23650000

301800                                      * .65 + .025.               23740000
301900                                                                  23750000

330700     IF '5285   ' =  B-PRIN-PROC-CODE   OR                        25999500
330800                     B-OTHER-PROC-CODE1 OR                        25999600
330900                     B-OTHER-PROC-CODE2 OR                        25999700
331000                     B-OTHER-PROC-CODE3 OR                        25999800
331100                     B-OTHER-PROC-CODE4 OR                        25999900
331200                     B-OTHER-PROC-CODE5                           26000000
331300           NEXT SENTENCE                                          26000100
331400     ELSE                                                         26000200
331500           MOVE ZEROES TO H-NEW-TECH-ADDON-ISLET                  26000300
331600           GO TO 4100-ADD-TECH-CASES.                             26000400
331700                                                                  26000500
331800     IF '5285   ' =  B-PRIN-PROC-CODE                             26000600
331900      COMPUTE H-TECH-ADDON-ISLET-CNTR =                           26000700
332000                       H-TECH-ADDON-ISLET-CNTR + 1.               26000800
332100                                                                  26000900
332200     IF '5285   ' =  B-OTHER-PROC-CODE1                           26001000
332300      COMPUTE H-TECH-ADDON-ISLET-CNTR =                           26001100
332400                       H-TECH-ADDON-ISLET-CNTR + 1.               26001200
332500                                                                  26001300
332600     IF '5285   ' =  B-OTHER-PROC-CODE2                           26001400
332700      COMPUTE H-TECH-ADDON-ISLET-CNTR =                           26001500
332800                       H-TECH-ADDON-ISLET-CNTR + 1.               26001600
332900                                                                  26001700

333100      COMPUTE H-TECH-ADDON-ISLET-CNTR =                           26001900
333200                       H-TECH-ADDON-ISLET-CNTR + 1.               26002000
333300                                                                  26002100

333500      COMPUTE H-TECH-ADDON-ISLET-CNTR =                           26002300
333600                       H-TECH-ADDON-ISLET-CNTR + 1.               26002400

335400*                                                                 26004200

336000*     COMPUTE H-TECH-ADDON-ISLET-CNTR2 =                          26004800
336100*                      H-TECH-ADDON-ISLET-CNTR2 + 1.              26004900
336200*                                                                 26005000
336300*    IF 'V707   ' =  B-OTHER-PROC-CODE5                           26005100
336400*     COMPUTE H-TECH-ADDON-ISLET-CNTR2 =                          26005200
336500*                    H-TECH-ADDON-ISLET-CNTR2 + 1.                26005300
336600*                                                                 26005400
336700*    IF  H-TECH-ADDON-ISLET-CNTR2 > 0                             26005500
336800*          NEXT SENTENCE                                          26005600
336900*    ELSE                                                         26005700
337000*          MOVE ZEROES TO H-NEW-TECH-ADDON-ISLET                  26005800
337100*          GO TO 4100-ADD-TECH-CASES.                             26005900
337200                                                                  26006000
337300     IF  H-TECH-ADDON-ISLET-CNTR = 1                              26006100
337400     MOVE 18848.00 TO H-NEW-TECH-ADDON-ISLET                      26006200
337500           GO TO 4100-ADD-TECH-CASES.                             26006300
337600                                                                  26006400
337700     IF  H-TECH-ADDON-ISLET-CNTR > 1                              26006500
337800     MOVE 37696.00 TO H-NEW-TECH-ADDON-ISLET                      26006600
337900           GO TO 4100-ADD-TECH-CASES.                             26006700
338000                                                                  26006800
338100     MOVE 0 TO H-NEW-TECH-ADDON-ISLET.                            26006900
338200                                                                  26007000
338300                                                                  26008000
338400 4100-ADD-TECH-CASES.                                             26009000
338500                                                                  26009100
338600     COMPUTE H-NEW-TECH-PAY-ADD-ON ROUNDED =                      26009200
338700             H-NEW-TECH-ADDON-ISLET.                              26009300
338800                                                                  26009400
338900 4100-EXIT.    EXIT.                                              26009500
339000                                                                  26009600
339100
339200 4200-SSRFBN-CODE-RTN.
339300     SET SSRFBN-IDX TO 1.
339400     SEARCH SSRFBN-TAB VARYING SSRFBN-IDX
339500         AT END
339600           MOVE ' NO SSRFBN MESSAGE FOUND' TO MES-SSRFBN
339700       WHEN WK-SSRFBN-STATE(SSRFBN-IDX) = MES-PPS-STATE
339800         MOVE WK-SSRFBN-REASON-ALL (SSRFBN-IDX) TO MES-SSRFBN.
339900
340000 4200-EXIT.   EXIT.
340100
340200******        L A S T   S O U R C E   S T A T E M E N T   *****   26009700
